评论概述: Do Not Purchase If Allergic To Nickel
评论详情: I purchased the sterling silver for my daughter as a Christmas present. I specifically looked for the paper clip style in sterling silver because she is allergic to nickel. These claimed to even be hypoallergenic in the product description. Within an hour of putting them in, her ear lobes were red, inflamed and throbbing, the exact reaction her skin gives when it comes in contact with nickel.  There is also no way to insert them in your ears without bending them, then bending them back once inserted. The ones I received are literal paper clips, not a paper clip style of earring.
These are very cheap, given the price I’d except them to be better then an actual paper clip. Just buy normal paper clips.
